title: Why F1 drivers think 'boring' Monaco GP will never change
summary: Formula 1 drivers believe it should be accepted that the Monaco Grand Prix will always be boring, and that it has to be appreciated for what it is. The Monteâ€¦

qa_pairs.question: What is a common criticism of the Monaco Grand Prix among F1 drivers?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It is often considered boring due to its lack of overtaking opportunities.
wrong_options: It is too dangerous for drivers.
The track is too short for F1 races.
The weather conditions are always unpredictable.

qa_pairs.question: Which characteristic of the Monaco GP contributes to its unique status in the F1 calendar?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Its narrow streets and tight corners make overtaking extremely difficult.
wrong_options: It has the longest lap of the season.
It features the highest average speed per lap.
It is run on a permanent race track.

qa_pairs.question: How do drivers generally feel about the tradition of the Monaco Grand Prix?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: They appreciate it for its historical significance despite its perceived lack of excitement.
wrong_options: They want it removed from the calendar.
They prefer racing on more modern tracks.
They believe it should have more laps.
